landing.bio: With a bachelor’s degree in Electronics Engineering, I began coding more than ten years ago, first involving micro-controllers and electronics software, then as a hobby. Finally, two years ago, I decided to make it my primary profession. Since then I have been focused on improving  my skills  and finding  interesting projects  and people  to work with.

projects.projectDetail: Test and improve your skills as a digital trader without losing your hard-earned savings!
projects.technologies: Ruby on Rails - Hosted in Heroku

projects.projectDetail: Search for the prices of the main crypto coins in the market.
Manage your purchases, sales, track your inventory and print reports.

experience.aboutWork: Part of the developer team. Started working remotely since beginning of August. The company provides last-mile technological solutions for e-commerce stores

tasks.task: Migration of the main apps from Heroku to AWS, obtaining benefits up to 100% in response time and improving scalability.
Integration with external API’s mainly related to e-commerce, such as Tiendanube, Shopify, WooComerce.
Solving internal / external issues through JIRA’s ticketing system.

experience.aboutWork: Part-time flexible. Started working remotely since beginning of August.

tasks.task: Instructing students in several introductory IT related courses, such as: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Python, Arduino, Git.

education.extra: Intensive 10-week Bootcamp covering: Javascript, Bootstrap, API’s (Google Maps, Google Voice, Facebook, Tumblr), Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Rspec, Sidekiq, Redis, Github, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Heroku.
Courses for Back-end (PHP, MySQL) and Front-end (HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap).

education.institute: National University of Mar del Plata
education.extra: Thesis: “Android App to Control A Domotic Home System”. Technologies: JAVA(Android), Objective C(Arduino), Google Voice's API, Bluetooth.

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from building websites and learning about technology I enjoy being outside, travelling, hiking, long walks on the beach and discovering new places.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors I very much enjoy music, particularly playing the guitar and piano. I also like a good movie or TV show.

awards.awardDetail: Started North India's First Student Design and Developer Conference.
